Text.Page:
My friend, you've done so much for me, but I have another favor to ask.

Borud is a researcher from Velika. Unfortunately, he's as battle-hardened as an egg. If you could escort him into the ruins, it would be a big help!
I understand you're a more than competent soldier. I'll do my best to keep up with you! Let's go!

Well, that was bracing! I should be fine here, . I'll get started on my research. Please, let Aresk know I'm safe.

Thanks for the help.
Thanks for helping Borud. I can't wait to hear his findings!
